document_data.mainbody:
Asala was a priestess of Kiaransalee in Szith Morcane in the late 15 century DR.
Asala was a young priestess of Kiaransalee under Velasta Tsarran.
Circa 1486 DR, after the fire giants occupied the outpost, Asalas lover was killed by a group of hell hounds and azers while they tried to escape. Asala wanted vengeance.
